scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Boku ga Kimi no Mimi ni Naru'.
scenes.song_name: Boku ga Kimi no Mimi ni Naru

scenes.description: Beginning of the performance of the song 'ODDS&ENDS'.

subtitles.original: 叶えたい
subtitles.english: ...want to make it come true.

subtitles.original: 声は聞こえなくても 愛が響いている
subtitles.english: Love can echo through the air even though you can't hear my voice

subtitles.original: そんな君をずっと 愛してる
subtitles.english: I'll always be in love with you

subtitles.original:
僕が君の耳になる
Lyrics: HANDSIGN Composition: 中村泰輔
subtitles.english:
Boku ga Kimi no Mimi ni Naru
Lyrics: HANDSIGN Composition: Taisuke Nakamura

subtitles.original: 君が見ている景色 僕も見えるといいな
subtitles.english: I wish I could experience what you see

subtitles.original: 手と手重なり合って 君に夢中になった
subtitles.english: Holding hand in hand made me crazy about you

subtitles.original: 聞こえないことで僕らは 聞こえないことで二人は
subtitles.english: By nothing being able to hear each other

subtitles.original: もっと知りたい 言葉にして
subtitles.english: I want to know more about you, in words

subtitles.original: モノクロだった世界中が
subtitles.english: The once monochrome world

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな色に変わった
subtitles.english: is now colored wonderfully

subtitles.original: 君が好きだよ どんな時も
subtitles.english: I love you, no matter what

subtitles.original: 溢れる思い 奏でるよ
subtitles.english: I'll always play with these overflowing feelings

subtitles.original: 僕が君の耳になる 君の一つになれる
subtitles.english: I'll be your ears so that I can become a part of you

subtitles.original: そんな夢を今 叶えたい
subtitles.english: I want to make such a dream come true right now

subtitles.original: 声は聞こえなくても 愛が響いている
subtitles.english: Love can echo through the air even though you can't hear my voice

subtitles.original: そんな君をずっと 愛してる
subtitles.english: I'll always be in love with you

subtitles.original: 君と見てきた景色 雨が降る日もあった
subtitles.english: I've shared some rainy days with you

subtitles.original: ふと見せる涙の意味を 僕もしれるといいな
subtitles.english: I wish I knew the meaning of your tears

subtitles.original: くだらないことで僕らは くだらないことで二人は
subtitles.english: We hurt each other over silly things

subtitles.original: 傷つけあって 本当にごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm really sorry that I hurt you

subtitles.original: どんな風にすれば二人
subtitles.english: How does a relationship between two people able to

subtitles.original: いつまでも 愛し合えるままでいれるかな
subtitles.english: continue to love each other and last forever?

subtitles.original: 君がいるから 頑張れるよ
subtitles.english: I'm able to continue because of you

subtitles.original: 支えてくれて ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for supporting me

subtitles.original: 僕が君の耳になる 君の一つになれる
subtitles.english: I'll be your ears so that I can become a part of you

subtitles.original: そんな夢を今 叶えたい
subtitles.english: I want to make such a dream come true right now

subtitles.original: 声が聞こえなくても 愛が響いている
subtitles.english: Love can echo through the air even though you can't hear my voice

subtitles.original: そんな君といま
subtitles.english: Even now, be with you

subtitles.original: 僕の手が枯れてゆくまで
subtitles.english: I swear I'll keep you safe until my hands wither

subtitles.original: 君を守り続けると誓うよ
subtitles.english: I swear I'll keep you safe until my hands wither

subtitles.english: Forever and ever, even after a century,
